metadata.title: Extrait des registres du Conseil d'Etat privé du roy

France. Conseil privé
Besongne, Jean-B. (Jean-Baptiste), 1680-1753, printer
metadata.publisher: A Rouen : De l'imprimerie de Jean-B. Besongne le fils, imprimeur ordinaire du roy, & de Mgr. l'intendant, au coin vis-à-vis la fontaine S. Lo, à l'imprimerie du Louvre
metadata.description: Place of publication and printer from colophon
"Fait au Conseil d'Etat privé du roy, tenu à Paris le treiziéme jour d'août mil sept cens vingt-un"--P. 4

Regarding an appeal submitted by Jean-Baptiste Besongne fils on behalf of the syndicate of printers and booksellers in Rouen opposing the Conseil privé's decision to permit Jacques Boisjouvin to succeed his grandfather Jean-Baptiste Besongne père as imprimeur-libraire of Rouen
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
